titles.title: I bow down before you Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I bow down before you Lord
I bow down before you Lord
Holy and faithful, righteous and true
You are my King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are Jesus, you are my Saviour
And with all that is within me
I bow down before you
(I kneel down before you)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I kneel down before you Lord
I kneel down before you Lord
Redeemer and Healer
Almighty God you are my King
